segments.text: From this vantage point, I take in the ordinary scene in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the overflowing sink catches my attention, almost crying out for a resolution.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the water damage that might happen if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and I can't help but feel amazed by his daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches into that cookie jar like it’s the grand treasure of the universe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, standing by, looks as if she’s about to burst with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But all of this mischief exists in a precarious balance, just waiting to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR
